original_title: Dog the Bounty Hunter: Crime Is on the Run
overview: Compiled by popular demand, this collection of most-watched "Dog the Bounty Hunter" episodes includes some of Dog and Beth's best work, like the time they tried to stop a fugitive from boarding a flight from Hawaii to Florida. Later on, the team gets tough with a drug addict who took his problems out on an innocent kitten, and goes head-to-head with a target who's got a serious anger management problem.
title: Dog the Bounty Hunter: Crime Is on the Run
